mapper.insert: insert into t_affiche_notice (notId, notType, notContent, notWriter, notReleaser, notState, notStatetype) values (#{notId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{notType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{notContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{notWriter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{notReleaser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{notState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{notStatetype,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update t_affiche_notice set notType = #{notType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, notContent = #{notContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, notWriter = #{notWriter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, notReleaser = #{notReleaser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, notState = #{notState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, notStatetype = #{notStatetype,jdbcType=INTEGER} where notId = #{notId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select notId, notType, notContent, notWriter, notWritetime, notReleaser, notReleasetime, notState, notStatetype from t_affiche_notice where notStatetype = #{notStatetype,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select notId, notType, notWriter, notWritetime, notReleaser, notReleasetime, notState, notStatetype from t_affiche_notice
